entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is holding Harry in his arms, apparently dead. ("ment, the people for whom he had tried to die would see him, lying apparently dead, in Hagrid’s arms.")

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is screaming in despair. ("The scream was the more terrible because he had never expected or dreamed that Professor McGonagall could make such a sound.")

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix is laughing and gloating over McGonagall's despair. ("He heard another woman laughing nearby, and knew that Bellatrix gloriied in McGonagall’s despair.")

entities.name: nagini
entities.description: Nagini is being stroked by Voldemort. ("He saw Voldemort standing a little in front of him, stroking Nagini’s head with a single white finger.")

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is standing near Harry and stroking Nagini's head. ("He saw Voldemort standing a little in front of him, stroking Nagini’s head with a single white finger.")

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is screaming for Harry to call back. ("‘No!’ ‘No! ’ ‘Harry! HARRY!’ Ron’s, Hermione’s, and Ginny’s voices were worse than McGonagall’s;")

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is screaming for Harry to call back. ("‘No!’ ‘No! ’ ‘Harry! HARRY!’ Ron’s, Hermione’s, and Ginny’s voices were worse than McGonagall’s;")

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is screaming for Harry to call back. ("‘No!’ ‘No! ’ ‘Harry! HARRY!’ Ron’s, Hermione’s, and Ginny’s voices were worse than McGonagall’s;")

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: The Death Eaters are being yelled at by the crowd of survivors. ("until their cries acted like a trigger; the crowd of survivors took up the cause, screaming and yelling abuse at the Death Eaters,")
